snippet: The police in Arlington, Tex., were trying to determine why Christian Taylor, a student, crashed his car into a car dealership, and why a police officer still in training fatally shot him.
abstract: Arlington, Tex, police are investigating why black college student Christian Taylor crashed car into car dealership and why trainee police officer Brad Miller fatally shot him; Taylor was unarmed at time of incident.
lead_paragraph: The police in Arlington, Tex., were trying to determine why Christian Taylor, a student, crashed his car into a car dealership, and why a police officer still in training fatally shot him.

headline.main: Texas Police Investigate Officer’s Role in Shooting
headline.print_headline: Texas Police Investigate Officer’s Role in Shooting
